msbt.message: Lunar New Year? It's def about celebrating with friends! And also eating some tasty treats!
I'm ALL about new stuff. That's why I get psyched up for New Year's and the Lunar New Year back-to-back!
I want to do a concert for the Lunar New Year! <10_4 />But I probs should have started planning it before right now.
I ate SO much food over New Year's! Now I'm going to eat a bunch of dumplings for Lunar New Year!
How're you spending your Lunar New Year, ? I want to enjoy it with you!
